Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.kneelawk.knet.api

  • Class
    Description
    NetByteBuf
    Special PacketByteBuf class that provides methods specific to "offset" reading and writing - like writing a single bit to the stream, and auto-compacting it with similar bits into a single byte.
    NetByteBuf.NetReader<T>
    A functional interface to read a value from NetByteBuf.
    NetByteBuf.NetWriter<T>
    A functional interface to write a value to NetByteBuf.
    NetByteBuf.SavedReaderIndex
    Holds an index into a NetByteBuf that can be restored.
    Palette<T>
    Maps objects to integers, allowing for smaller packet sizes when the same objects are referenced multiple times.
